item.title: 高盛、黑石将为制药公司收购案提供9.76亿美元贷款
item.description: 据知情人士透露，多家私募信贷巨头即将加入澳大利亚私募股权公司BGH Capital Pty.的14亿澳元（9.76亿美元）贷款计划，该贷款将用于支持其收购Aspen Pharmacare Holdings Ltd.的亚太区业务。【原文：Several private credit heavyweights are set to join Australia private equity firm BGH Capital Pty.’s A$1.4 billion ($976 million) loan backing its acquisition of Aspen Pharmacare Holdings Ltd.’s Asia Pacific operations, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 菲律宾央行行长称利率互换交易量激增
item.description: 菲律宾央行行长表示，自2024年末推出比索利率互换工具以来，该国利率互换交易量已激增逾60倍。他指出，市场深度的提升或将增强货币政策的有效性。【原文：Interest-rate swap transactions in the Philippines have jumped more than 60-fold since the launch of a peso IRS facility in late 2024, the nation’s central bank chief said, citing that a deepening market may improve the effectiveness of monetary policy.】

item.title: 沙索公司利润因油价下跌暴跌，计提4.83亿美元减值损失
item.description: 萨索尔有限公司对南非和莫桑比克部分业务计提了78亿兰特（4.83亿美元）的减值准备，加之油价和化工品价格下跌，导致其半年利润暴跌99%。【原文：Sasol Ltd.’s 7.8 billion-rand ($483 million) writedown in parts of its South African and Mozambican businesses, together with a decline in oil and chemical prices, triggered a drop of as much as 99% in half-year profit.】

item.title: 印度作为关键科技市场，青少年社交媒体使用争议日益加剧
item.description: 印度官员正公开讨论社交媒体的年龄限制问题，这可能对科技巨头构成新的挑战——该国拥有庞大的用户市场，而全球范围内关于网络危害儿童的讨论正日益升温。【原文：Officials in India are publicly debating age restrictions for accessing social media, a potential fresh challenge to Big Tech in a massive market for users as global debate grows over online harms to children.】

item.title: 新加坡交易所寻求中国及东盟企业上市以充实项目储备
item.description: 新加坡交易所有限公司正寻求吸引更多来自中国和东南亚的公司在该城市国家上市，以提振首次公开募股的势头，一位高管表示。【原文：Singapore Exchange Ltd. is seeking to woo more companies from China and Southeast Asia to list in the city-state to increase momentum in initial public offerings, according to an executive.】

item.title: 欧洲央行将维持利率不变，尽管全球面临压力：决策指南
item.description: 欧洲央行准备连续第五次会议维持利率不变，认为近期全球紧张局势加剧和欧元走强尚未使经济偏离轨道。【原文：The European Central Bank is set to hold interest rates steady for a fifth meeting, judging that the latest bout of global tensions and euro strength haven’t thrown the economy off course yet.】

item.title: 主宰欧洲最动荡电力市场的科幻量化交易者
item.description:
第二基金会已发展成为欧洲日内交易的主导力量——这要归功于布拉格一群热爱解谜的数学精英。

【原文：

Second Foundation has grown to dominate European intraday trading — thanks to a group of puzzle-loving mathletes in Prague.

】

item.title: 捷克央行将维持利率不变，通胀可能引发宽松政策辩论
item.description: 捷克政策制定者将在2026年首次会议上维持利率不变，因预期整体通胀放缓可能为今年进一步放松货币政策创造空间。【原文：Czech policymakers are set to hold interest rates at their first meeting of 2026 as an expected slowdown in headline inflation may open room for more monetary easing this year.】

item.title: 首尔公寓价格持续攀升，李明博决心更坚定
item.description: 首尔公寓价格持续上涨，这场涨势正考验着政府遏制投机性购房的努力，也加剧了李在明总统对多房持有者的批评。【原文：Seoul apartment prices extended a rally that is testing the government’s efforts to curb speculative buying and sharpening President Lee Jae Myung’s criticism of those who own more than one home.】

item.title: 英国正迎来一场期待已久的经济复苏浪潮
item.description: 自金融危机以来，刺猬图一直是英国财政大臣和英格兰银行行长的噩梦。【原文：The hedgehog chart has been the bane of British finance ministers and Bank of England chiefs since the financial crisis.】

item.title: 马来西亚认为令吉仍有上涨空间，2026年经济增长预测
item.description: 马来西亚第二财政部长阿米尔·哈姆扎·阿齐赞表示，作为过去一年亚洲表现最佳的货币，马币仍有升值空间，因该国经济持续强劲增长，并暗示经济增长预测可能上调。【原文：The Malaysian ringgit, Asia’s top performing currency in the past year, still has potential to gain as the economy continues to perform strongly, Second Finance Minister Amir Hamzah Azizan said, indicating that growth forecasts may be revised higher.】

item.title: 中国交易员押注黄金赚取30亿美元后，大举做空白银
item.description: 一位因押注黄金创纪录涨势而声名鹊起的中国亿万富翁交易员，如今将目光转向白银的飙升行情，其押注白银暴跌的头寸目前价值近3亿美元。【原文：A billionaire Chinese trader who made his name riding gold’s record-breaking rally has turned his sights to silver’s breakneck surge, with a bet on the metal’s collapse now worth almost $300 million.】

item.title: 中国消费类股票在假期前获得买盘支撑，科技股则持续走低
item.description: 中国消费类股票正赢得投资者青睐，而其科技股同行则在全球市场暴跌中失势。市场预期消费类股票将受益于即将到来的农历新年假期期间的消费增长。【原文：Chinese consumer stocks are winning favor with investors just as their high-flying tech peers lose ground amid a global rout, with expectations growing that the former will benefit from increased spending during the upcoming Lunar New Year break.】

item.title: 印尼第四季度经济增长5.39%，超出预期
item.description: 印尼第四季度经济增速超出预期，政府支出加速提振了国内需求，这可能提振市场信心——此前印尼盾和本地股市近期持续走低。【原文：Indonesia’s economy grew faster than expected in the fourth quarter as faster government spending buoyed domestic demand, potentially boosting sentiment after a recent slump in the rupiah and local stocks.】

item.title: 泰国通胀连续第十个月保持负增长
item.description: 泰国整体通胀率连续第十个月保持在负值区间，延续了该国自疫情以来最长的物价下跌周期。【原文：Thailand’s headline inflation remained in the negative territory for a 10th straight month, extending the country’s longest stretch of falling prices since the pandemic.】

item.title: 印尼削减煤炭配额或将导致中国主要买家撤离
item.description: 若印尼降低生产配额限制出口，中国煤炭进口商已准备转向替代供应渠道。此举可能削弱雅加达政府提价的努力，并面临疏远其最大买家的风险。【原文：China’s coal importers are ready to turn to alternative supplies if Indonesia’s lower production quotas curb exports, a shift that could undermine Jakarta’s efforts to lift prices and risk alienating its top buyer.】

item.title: 印度反垄断机构将调查印地戈航空航班取消事件
item.description: 印度反垄断监管机构已下令对运营印度航空公司的InterGlobe Aviation Ltd.展开调查，以查证该国最大航空公司是否在去年12月大规模取消航班引发出行混乱后滥用其市场支配地位。【原文：India’s antitrust watchdog ordered an investigation into InterGlobe Aviation Ltd., which operates IndiGo, to probe allegations whether country’s largest airline abused its dominant position following mass cancellation of flights in December unleashing travel chaos.】

item.title: 日本30年期国债拍卖因需求坚挺安抚市场焦虑情绪
item.description: 日本30年期国债拍卖需求强劲，缓解了市场对长期债务的短期担忧。就在数日后，一场备受瞩目的选举将决定财政支出的规模。【原文：Japan’s 30-year bond auction drew stronger demand, easing immediate concerns about longer-maturity debt just days from a closely watched election that will determine the extent of fiscal spending.】

item.title: 铜价跌破13,000美元，库存水平与中国需求成焦点
item.description: 铜价延续跌势，因投资者关注库存上升及中国买家需求疲软，尽管本周早些时候曾出现逢低买盘。【原文：Copper extended losses as investors focused on rising inventories and waning appetite from Chinese buyers, even after some dip-buying emerged earlier this week.】

item.title: 索尼股价大涨6%，因上调业绩预期且销售表现强劲
item.description: 索尼集团在经历艰难假日季度后，意外实现利润22%的增长，并因娱乐业务需求强劲而上调全年业绩预期。【原文：Sony Group Corp. reported a surprise 22% improvement in profit after a challenging holiday quarter, raising its full-year outlook on the back of solid demand for its entertainment offerings.】

item.title: 铁矿石价格回落至每吨100美元区间，海运市场供需平衡趋缓
item.description: 受中国季节性需求放缓、市场供需平衡趋缓迹象以及金属价格全面回落影响，铁矿石价格跌向每吨100美元。【原文：Iron ore fell toward $100 a ton on a seasonal slowdown in China, signs of a softening market balance, and a broad retreat in metals.】

item.title: 贝莱德首席执行官芬克看好印度
item.description: 芬克表示，印度人必须与国家经济增长同步投资。【原文：It’s vital for Indians to invest alongside the nation’s economic growth: Fink.】

item.title: 韩国贸易部长敦促谨慎应对美国关税风险
item.description: 韩国贸易部长表示，美国提高关税的威胁依然存在，同时强调需要谨慎处理其他问题，包括与Coupang公司相关的事项，以确保这些问题不会升级为更广泛的摩擦源。【原文：South Korea’s top trade chief said the threat of higher US tariffs persists, while stressing the need to carefully manage other issues, including those related to Coupang Inc., to ensure they don’t escalate into broader sources of friction.】

item.title: 澳大利亚与欧盟将举行会谈，力争达成自由贸易协定
item.description: 澳大利亚贸易部长即将前往布鲁塞尔，与欧盟官员进行会谈，试图达成一项自由贸易协定。该协定若签署生效，将成为欧盟今年签署的第三项重大贸易协议，并有助于欧盟抵御特朗普政府施加的压力。【原文：Australia’s trade minister is set to travel to Brussels for talks with European Union officials to try and secure a free trade accord, which if signed would be the bloc’s third major agreement this year and bolster its efforts to stave off pressure from the Trump administration.】

item.title: 增税冲击印度360亿美元套利交易
item.description: 印度套利基金经理正为收益下滑做准备，此前政府意外上调了股票衍生品的税率，此举威胁到这个管理着360亿美元资产的快速增长行业。【原文：India’s arbitrage fund managers are bracing for lower returns after the government unexpectedly raised taxes on equity derivatives, a move that threatens a fast-growing sector that holds $36 billion in assets.】

item.title: 动力设备制造商福杰特及其投资者在首次公开募股中筹集15亿美元
item.description: 福根特电力解决方案公司及其部分投资者在美国首次公开募股中筹集了15亿美元，其股票定价处于市场发行价区间的中心点。【原文：Forgent Power Solutions Inc. and some of its backers raised $1.5 billion in its US initial public offering, pricing its shares at the midpoint of the marketed range.】

item.title: 加拿大将废除电动汽车法规，汽车制造商获胜
item.description: 加拿大总理马克·卡尼即将宣布针对轿车和卡车的新燃油效率标准体系，该体系将取代汽车行业深恶痛绝的电动汽车强制标准。【原文：Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney is set to announce a new system of fuel-efficiency standards for cars and trucks, replacing an electric vehicle mandate that was hated by the auto industry.】

item.title: 对冲基金、银行争相招聘交易员，因市场波动加剧
item.description: 从金属到货币的极端市场波动正推动对冲基金和银行加速招聘，它们正寻求能够利用飙升波动性获利的交易员。【原文：Extreme market swings from metals to currencies are fueling a hiring push at hedge funds and banks as they seek traders who can capitalize on surging volatility.】

item.title: 澳联储可能在3月再次加息，西太平洋银行经济学家埃利斯发出警告
item.description: 西太平洋银行首席经济学家露西·埃利斯表示，随着澳大利亚储备银行开启2026年全球首个加息周期，该行可能被迫在3月连续第二次上调利率。【原文：The Reserve Bank of Australia may be forced to raise interest rates for a second consecutive time in March, according to Westpac Banking Corp. Chief Economist Luci Ellis, as the central bank embarks on the world’s first tightening cycle of 2026.】

item.title: 印尼股市亿万富豪的掌控面临清算
item.description: 印尼股市仅用两天动荡就凸显了投资者长期以来的忧虑：部分市场交易并不自由。【原文：Indonesia’s stock market needed just two days of chaos to highlight what investors have long lamented: parts of the market aren’t trading freely.】
